1.0.name: wordpress/automatic-page-publish-expire
1.0.description: This plugin is very useful for those who want to display their pages (on front end) from some specific date (start date) to some specific date (end date). It creates a meta box in Edit Page where Admin user can add start & end date/time. After End date has been passed, the page will expire and is saved as 'draft'. Very fast, easy to use plugin for both single & multi site installation. It uses GMT time format.
